com.crawljax.core.configuration

Class CrawlActions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.crawljax.core.configuration.CrawlActions

  • public class CrawlActions
extends Object
    Specifies the actions for CrawlElements NOTE: In general CrawlActions is not designed to be instantiated directly. CrawlActions should be used via CrawlSpecification To add conditions to check whether a tag should (not) be clicked one can use when(Condition...) . See also Condition
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    DannyRoest@gmail.com (Danny Roest)

      protected CrawlActions()
      Protected Constructor of CrawlActions can only be instanced from class from the same package.

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CrawlElement click(String tagName)
      Set of HTML elements Crawljax will click during crawling For exmple 1) 2)
      click("a") will only include 1 if clickOnce is true (default).
      CrawlElement dontClick(String tagName)
      Set of HTML elements Crawljax will NOT click during crawling When an HTML is present in the click and dontClick sets, then the element will not be clicked.
      protected List<CrawlElement> getCrawlElements() 
      protected List<CrawlElement> getCrawlElementsExcluded() 
      CrawlActions when(Condition... conditions)
      Crawljax will crawl the HTML elements while crawling if and only if all the specified conditions are satisfied.

    • Method Detail

      • click

        public CrawlElement click(String tagName)
        Set of HTML elements Crawljax will click during crawling For exmple 1) 2)
        click("a") will only include 1 if clickOnce is true (default). This set can be restricted by dontClick(String).
        Parameters:
        tagName - the tag name of the elements to be included
        Returns:
        this CrawlElement

      • dontClick

        public CrawlElement dontClick(String tagName)
        Set of HTML elements Crawljax will NOT click during crawling When an HTML is present in the click and dontClick sets, then the element will not be clicked. For example: 1) Some text 2) 3)
        click("a") dontClick("a").withAttribute("class", "foo"); Will include only include HTML element 2
        Parameters:
        tagName - the tag name of the elements to be excluded
        Returns:
        crawlTag the CrawlElement

      • when

        public CrawlActions when(Condition... conditions)
        Crawljax will crawl the HTML elements while crawling if and only if all the specified conditions are satisfied. IMPORTANT: only works with click()!!! For example: when(onContactPageCondition) will only click the HTML element if it is on the contact page
        Parameters:
        conditions - the condition to be met.
        Returns:
        this

      • getCrawlElements

        protected List<CrawlElement> getCrawlElements()
        Returns:
        the crawlElements

        protected List<CrawlElement> getCrawlElementsExcluded()
        Returns:
        the crawlElementsExcluded
